spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deep rothé's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast {@spell dancing lights} at will, requiring no components.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.
